description: This product has a new molecular chemistry that enables you to apply Butter Wet Wax to a wet or a dry surface. This high-shine, wet wax can be applied in the sun or the shade on a wet or a dry surface. It makes the job fast and easy. This is the wettest wax. It delivers an unmatched surface shine and wet look. This technology that consists of a special blend of polymers, resins, and natural Carnauba. Butter Wet Wax leaves your car shining like it was just washed. Butter Wax contains no cleaners or abrasives, and will not stain plastic or rubber. Carnauba, also called Brazil wax and palm wax, is a wax acquired from the leaves of the palm named Copernicia prunifera, a plant native to and grown only in the north-east of Brazil. Carnauba Cream is considered by many to be the, "queen of waxes" and usually comes in the form of hard yellow-brown flakes. This product has the refined flaxes and blends them with a fine assortment of lubricating agents and oil to nurture and maintain the highest level of shine to your vehicle.
title: Chemical Guys WAC_104_16 Butter Wet Wax Wet Look Shine Car Wax - 16 oz.
